Content: Second lunar empire: The player takes the role of multiple sector
gouvernors implementing the second empires aggressive foreign policy by
subjugating an incorporating alien species. This part of the campaign
introduces the player to differen alien species (including hiveminds,
AI empires, Nomadas etc.), it also should introduce the players to
different FTL methods galactic event and other skirmish mode mechanics
